article: Mr.Brown is my uncle .He is 40 _ old .He works in a sports club . His job is to _ the students how to play basketball .He _ far from the club .He has a car ,but he doesn't _ his car to work .Usually ,he goes to work _ bike .He thinks it is good _ and he can get to the club early when many buses and cars are in the street .Every morning ,Mr.Brown gets up at 6:30 .Then he takes a shower and has _ good breakfast .At 7:40 ,he _ his bike to the club .The bike ride usually _ an hour ."I never feel tired .I think the ride is _ and interesting ,"says Mr.Brown .
